name: @pantas-net/zapatos
description: Zero-Abstraction Postgres for TypeScript (temporary package until the main one is updated)

scripts.build: npx tsc && npx gen-esm-wrapper db db.mjs && npx gen-esm-wrapper generate generate.mjs
scripts.version: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.warn('>>> \u001b[1;33mZapatos was installed or upgraded. Please (re-)run \u001b[1;32mnpx zapatos\u001b[1;33m.\u001b[0m <<<\u000a')"

author: George MacKerron
